definition: mesquite of Gulf Coast and Caribbean Islands from Mexico to Venezuela
details:
noun
- mesquite of Gulf Coast and Caribbean Islands from Mexico to Venezuela
- mesquite pod used in tanning and dyeing
= synonyms: algarrobilla, algarobilla
- evergreen Mediterranean tree with edible pods
= synonyms: carob
- long pod containing small beans and sweetish edible pulp
= synonyms: carob
